mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, T.TYPE, N.SUBJECT, N.HITCOUNT, N.NOTICED_DATE FROM NOTICES N JOIN NOTICE_TYPE T ON N.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = T.NOTICE_TYPE_ID ORDER BY N.NOTICED_DATE DESC

SELECT S.NOTICE_ID, S.TYPE, S.SUBJECT, S.HITCOUNT, S.NOTICED_DATE FROM ( SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, T.TYPE, N.SUBJECT, N.HITCOUNT, N.NOTICED_DATE FROM NOTICES N JOIN NOTICE_TYPE T ON N.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = T.NOTICE_TYPE_ID ORDER BY N.NOTICED_DATE DESC ) S WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, T.TYPE, N.SUBJECT, N.CONTENT, N.HITCOUNT, N.NOTICED_DATE FROM NOTICES N JOIN NOTICE_TYPE T ON N.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = T.NOTICE_TYPE_ID WHRER N.NOTICE_ID = #{notice_id}

SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, T.TYPE, N.SUBJECT, N.CONTENT, N.HITCOUNT, N.NOTICED_DATE FROM NOTICES N JOIN NOTICE_TYPE T ON N.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = T.NOTICE_TYPE_ID
AND N.SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{search_text} || '%'
ORDER BY N.NOTICED_DATE DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, T.TYPE, N.SUBJECT, N.CONTENT, N.HITCOUNT, N.NOTICED_DATE FROM NOTICES N JOIN NOTICE_TYPE T ON N.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = T.NOTICE_TYPE_ID
AND N.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search_text} || '%'
ORDER BY N.NOTICED_DATE DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_ID, T.TYPE, N.SUBJECT, N.CONTENT, N.HITCOUNT, N.NOTICED_DATE FROM NOTICES N JOIN NOTICE_TYPE T ON N.NOTICE_TYPE_ID = T.NOTICE_TYPE_ID
AND ((N.SUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{search_text} || '%') OR (N.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{search_text} || '%'))
ORDER BY N.NOTICED_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM NOTICES
